item.title: Spencer LaVere Smith
item.description: I'm excited that Pacific Optica is releasing their new scan optics. https://pacificoptica.com/ventana/ For those of you who know two-photon imaging well, check out the specs on the link. These optics are unprecedented. They're easy to integrate into a rig (using Thorlabs SM2 and SM3 threads) and they provide a way bigger diffraction-limited imaging field-of-view. No more vignetting due to the scan engine.
